locals

Interface Localizable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AGC, AGV, DistributionCenter, DropOffLocal, Local, PickUpLocal, StorageLocal, TowingVehicle, ULC, Warehouse

    public interface Localizable
    EN Localizable interface used in localizable objects such as locations and vehicles. The classes that implement this interface can be accessed by position, set the position and can display such position on a visual matrix. PT Interface localizável usada em objetos localizáveis, como locais e veículos. As classes que implementam esta interface podem ser acedidas por posição, definir a posição e pode exibir tal posição em uma matriz visual.
    Author:
    guilh

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void display(char[][] matrix)
      Uses the matrix of positions to display and update the position of this Localizable object.
      Position getPosition()
      Returns the position (x value and y value).
      void setPosition(Position position)
      Sets a new position (x value and y value).
